home.title: Hi, my name is Carlos Loja

about.title: About me
about.subtitle: Here you will find information about me and my skills
about.descriptionKnowMe: Hello! My name is Carlos Loja, I’m a Mobile and Full Stack Developer. Since I started my career as a computer science engineer, I have felt a great passion for programming, and I am also one of the people who thinks that a good project makes the programmer, that is why I am always willing to accept new challenges and solve them, with the highest possible quality. I’m open to job opportunities or independent projects where I can contribute, grow, learn and share my knowledge with others. If you have a good opportunity that is related to my skills and experience, don’t hesitate to contact me.
